<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blood in the Air](/Feats.aspx?ID=3190) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 116 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Requirements**
An enemy you've damaged with a ranged weapon during the last minute is [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) from you.

</column>

---

Once you've locked on to a target, little can obscure your aim. Make a ranged weapon Strike against the required target. This Strike ignores the target's concealed condition and reduces the flat check for the hidden condition from 11 to 5.
